We are a 
[pharmacology](area/pharmacology/index.qmd) 
and
[computational chemistry](area/medicinal-chemistry/index.qmd) 
lab that studies 
[infectious diseases](area/infectious-diseases), 
[antimicrobial resistance](area/antimicrobial-resistance/index.qmd),
and the 
[human gut microbiome](area/human-gut-microbiome/index.qmd). 
Our approaches include 
[artificial intelligence](area/artificial-intelligence/index/index.qmd) and high-performance computing of 
[genomics](area/genomics/index.qmd), 
[structural biology](area/structural-biology/index.qmd), 
and other
[advanced methods](area/advanced-methods/index.qmd),
These efforts accomplish our mission to advance the 
[drug development](area/drug-development),
[clinical](area/pharmacy/index.qmd),
and 
[economic](area/economic-analysis/index.qmd) 
outcomes in the treatment and elimination of infectious diseases for the benefit of society today and generations tomorrow.
